name: spacewar
description: SpaceWar is a game tribute to the 1984 game by the same name. This game has several differences from the original, however.

scripts.build-web: webpack --config webpack.webconfig.js && mkdir -p dist/web/assets && cp webindex.html ./dist/web/index.html && cp assets/* ./dist/web/assets
scripts.build-electron: webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp build/out.js . && build -w -l -m zip
scripts.publish-web: cd dist/web && aws s3 sync . s3://spacewar.pro --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --region us-east-1 && cd ../..
scripts.publish-itch: butler push dist/linux-unpacked fritzy/spacewar:linux --userversion `node -pe "require('./package.json').version"` && butler push dist/win-unpacked fritzy/spacewar:win --userversion `node -pe "require('./package.json').version"` && butler push dist/mac fritzy/spacewar:mac   --userversion `node -pe "require('./package.json').version"`

author: Nathan Fritz
